bibl.title: The Treasures of Coptic Art in the Coptic Museum and Churches of Old Cairo.
bibl.publisher: A Supreme Council of Antiquities Edition
bibl.pubPlace: The American University in Cairo Press
bibl.note: 2 front. coul., 1 carte, 159 figg. et pll. coul.

Preface. - Introduction. - Chronology. - History of the Coptic Museum. - Pagan Art and Coptic Art. - Nilotica. - Pharaonic Elements in Coptic Art and Architecture. - Egyptian Monasticism. - Old Testament Themes. - Glorification of the Holy Virgin. - Pilgrimage. - Writing. - The Nag Hammadi Library. - Articles of Daily Life. - Burials. - The Church. - The Churches of Old Cairo. - Glossary. - Bibliographic Notes to the Text. - Bibliography and Abbreviations.
